Media Interactions

AAP Odisha in Media

AAP has been known for its proactive engagement with the media, often using social media to communicate their message and bypassing traditional media channels.

Kanak News

Kanak News in Odisha invites AAP team to discuss several issues.

View Kanak News Projects
 arrow_downward

Discussions at Kanak News

Kanak News is a 24-hour Odia language news channel based in Odisha, India, that provides comprehensive coverage of regional news, current affairs, politics, sports, and entertainment.

Media Coverage by OTV News

OTV News is a popular Odia language news channel based in Odisha, India, that delivers round-the-clock news coverage of local and national news, politics, sports, entertainment, and more."

Facebook Live

We often use Facebook live to raise a variety of issues.

View Facebook Live Projects
 arrow_downward

Raising issues over social media

The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) uses Facebook Live to engage with their audience and raise awareness about various social and political issues. We often feature party leaders, experts, and activists in these live sessions, where they discuss issues such as corruption, unemployment, education, and healthcare, and also take questions and feedback from viewers. The party also uses Facebook Live to stream rallies, press conferences, and other events to reach a wider audience and mobilize support for their cause.

arrow_forward Read More

In Odisha, AAP aims to provide a clean, accountable, and transparent government to the people of the state, free from corruption and nepotism. AAP Odisha has been actively working to address issues like healthcare, education, water management, and women's safety, among others. The party has been working towards creating a strong grassroots network in the state and has been actively engaging with the people of Odisha to understand their problems and provide them with practical solutions.
